013package org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.springboot;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.*;
018import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.*;
019
020/**
021 * Sample REST resource that prints out a simple "Hello world!" message.
022 *
023 * <ul class='seealso'>
024 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server-springboot.jrss.Overview">juneau-rest-server-springboot &gt; Overview</a>
025
026 * </ul>
027 */
028@Rest(
029   title="Hello World",
030   description="An example of the simplest-possible resource",
031   path="/helloWorld"
032)
033@HtmlDocConfig(
034   aside={
035      "<div style='max-width:400px' class='text'>",
036      "  <p>This page shows a resource that simply response with a 'Hello world!' message</p>",
037      "  <p>The POJO serialized is a simple String.</p>",
038      "</div>"
039   }
040)
041public class HelloWorldResource extends BasicRestObject {
042
043   @Autowired
044   private HelloWorldMessageProvider messageProvider;
045
046   /**
047    * GET request handler.
048    *
049    * @return A simple Hello-World message.
050    */
051   @RestGet(path="/*", summary="Responds with injected message")
052   public String sayHello() {
053      return messageProvider.get();
054   }
055}
